channel.title: Marketise Me - online marketing and website development.
channel.description: Recent content on Marketise Me - online marketing and website development.

item.title: Blog Photos on Phone
item.description: Viral dreamcatcher keytar typewriter, aesthetic offal umami. Wellness spaces that reach neglected communities of color are essential, says spiritual advisor, mojo health advocate, and writer Anna Smith. As the 26-year-old Brooklyn native will tell you in her signature metaphysical-no-chaser way, when your mojo is in a bad place every aspect of your life is affected. She’s part of a growing effort to foster more inclusive healing spaces that take into account how racism, poverty, ableism, misogyny, and gender discrimination inform our self-care needs.

item.title: Creative Design
item.description: Creating a corporate logo Creation of digital banners Creation of a design for events GIF's Animated videos Product videos Professional photographic services The team of Marketise Me consists of ambitious and experienced web design professionals motivated to create various, distinctive and memorable design projects, distinctive design, company logo, banner advertising for your site, interactive clips and animations to help your business to show up in his best light, to stand out among others in the industry and to give a new direction in his development.

item.title: Email Campaigns
item.description: Creating custom campaigns Professional design for every email Automated delivery Quality engaging content Accelerating the sales cycle Increasing the awareness among customers Maintaining the interest of existing customers Reaching to new customers Full compliance with GDPR Creating emails that motivate people to buy your products and services. Engaging emails to help you reach your goals. Also creating "consistent campaigns" or email automation sequences to systematically send an email stream to your marketing customers.

item.title: Marketing Consultations
item.description: Development of a marketing strategy Building a plan with key development stages External market environment analysis Competitor analysis SWOT analysis USP analysis Defining Business KPI’s Marketise Me is developing a marketing strategy to position a product or service on the market. The marketing strategy for positioning the product / service aims to create a unique product proposal that will dominate the target group’s mind. We create SWOT analysis and identify the strengths and favors of your brand as well as the potential for future development and the dangers of your competitors in the market environment.

item.title: Performance marketing
item.description: - Facebook & Instagram ads Build ad campaigns according to your business goals Creating and testing different designs Creating quality content and unique texts for your ads Analasing the customers and targeting them according to their profile Testing ad campaigns and optimise different settings Reports and analysis of the work performed - Google ads Display network, banners, video and text ads Search network, text ads on the Google search engine Remarketing Campaigns - Users who re-visit your site can see your ads on Google Network sites Youtube Advertising Campaigns - LinkedIn Ads Advertising on Facebook, Google and Instagram is a powerful tool for selling on the internet.

item.title: Search Engine Marketing
item.description: SEO Website optimisation for organic search engine rankings Internal optimisation External optimisation SEA - building and implementing Pay Per Click advertising campaigns. *Contact our team for more information on these services. Why do we need search engine marketing? Nowadays every business has a website and almost any of them uses Google Ads. Sites that go back to the rankings can remain “invisible” as nearly 80% of all users are browsing only the first results page.

item.title: Social Media Marketing – Facebook & Instagram
item.description: Cover design and profile picture Content creation and sharing posts Creating marketing campaigns for your products or services Installing Facebook Pixel to track various statistics Reputation management and comments moderation Personal answer Preparation of monthly reports on the development of the website Monthly optimisation of your webpage We use professional photos to support your website Marketise Me will show you how social media can work for you.

item.title: User Experience
item.description: Building user-friendly web pages Designing beautiful customizable web and mobile sites Building a website that offers a positive user experience Designing a whole product integration process Working on the functionality of the project Tune in with the human element End product that brings added value and enjoyment Designing beautiful responsive web and mobile sites with creativity and precision that create amazing customer experiences.Creating intelligently personalised user experiences that are custom tailored to your audience delivering engaging digital experiences.

item.title: Website Development
item.description: Designing a portfolio website with ready-made Wordpress / Opencart themes Wordpress website / Opencart online store Custom website Website architecture Creating unique design tailored to your goals and needs Responsive design / Mobile friendly optimisation for easy and convenient access from mobile device Option to translate website in different language Analytics Tools Installation - Google Analytics and Facebook Pixel Implementation and testing of the project Creating and maintaining a website is a key element in building your online reputation and occupying your company’s leading market positions.

item.title: Working Process
item.description: Initial discussion Looking for digital marketing assistance. You probably need a website. You may have a website, but it needs improvement or your customers just can't find it. Your website may be fine, but you need help building a social media presence that engages with existing and potential customers. Whatever your digital marketing needs, we're here to help. We don't think of ourselves as a digital services agency, we prefer to be perceived as your partner.
